definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.english: Application accessibility is all about removing the obstacles for users who have disabilities.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序可訪問性是指爲殘障人士掃除使用障礙。

sentences.english: Pistorius will take part in the upcoming Beijing Paralympics.
sentences.chinese: 皮斯托利斯將參加即將舉行的北京殘障運動會。

sentences.english: I was one of the first disabled students to be integrated into a main-stream school.
sentences.chinese: 我是進入主流學校的第一批殘障學生之一。

sentences.english: Trying to control the shakiness of my voice, I asked for the Center on Sexuality and Disability.
sentences.chinese: 我叫“性和殘障中心”，聲音在顫抖，無法控制。

sentences.english: The other day I saw a disabled man selling chewing gum outside a MRT station.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天，我在捷運站外看到一名殘障男子賣口香糖。

sentences.english: The car park reserved for disabled persons is in via Harar.
sentences.chinese: 爲殘障人士保留的停車區域在阿拉爾路。

sentences.english: Furthermore, she inspires people through her disability.
sentences.chinese: 此外，她更藉着自身的殘障來鼓舞別人。

sentences.english: But I agree that we have to help the handicapped.
sentences.chinese: 但我確實很贊同我們應該幫助殘障人士。

sentences.english: Of course, one of the most powerful capabilities is to assist the physically challenged.
sentences.chinese: 當然，它最強大的功能是用來幫助殘障者。

sentences.english: One of these is physical access to the content for handcap people.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個問題是爲殘障人士提供互聯網內容的訪問。

sentences.english: The letter of intent concerned both para-taekwondo kyorugi and poomsae.
sentences.chinese: 意向書涉及殘障跆拳道對打和品勢。

sentences.english: The Eden Foundation has begun computer programming training for those with limb disabilities.
sentences.chinese: 伊甸殘障福利基金會針對肢障者開設電腦程式設計班。

sentences.english: Oticon makes devices that help with the hearing impaired.
sentences.chinese: Oticon製造幫助聽力殘障人士的儀器。

sentences.english: This site also offers career and employment resources for job-seekers with disabilities such as autism.
sentences.chinese: 該網站還爲自閉症之類的殘障學生提供求職就業資源。

sentences.english: The right to equal employment of persons with disabilities can also be protected and promoted through this framework.
sentences.chinese: 殘障者的平等就業權亦可通過此種框架加以保障。

sentences.english: One should never use the term the handicapped (or the deaf, the blind and such like).
sentences.chinese: 注意，提到殘疾人，更宜用“殘障。

definition: disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal
ability to make one's own decisions
variant Chinese character/alternative form of a Chinese character
shill/tout/phony customer who pretends to buys things so as to lure real customers
